::Destron Base/Magmatron::

    It picked up on the transmission and rerout=
ed it to Magmatron. From there he told the computer to send a pulse beacon =
to the bot. The ship did. Magmatron hoped the bot would find it's way to th=
e base.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Rudra656@... 
  To: nbw=
rpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, November 17, 2000 8:19 PM
  Subject: Cygnu=
s


  ::Cygnus::
      He landed to rest his weary wings and began walking =
around.  He could 
  tell from the foliage he was somewhere in Maine or nea=
r there.  He sends out 
  a message instead of searching for more bots he w=
ould let them find him 
  "Hello.  This is Cygnus.  I am looking for others=
.  Someone please find me.  
  I'm a little lost."

        eGroups Sponsor=
